title: sudo npm install -g serverless
body: What makes wsl so useful to me and many others is being able to do web/cloud based development stuff from within Windows. At the moment I've had good results with things like the AWS CLI for linux and many other things, but serverless is not playing ball:

comments.body: Do not use sudo! Please never use sudo to do development work. Install everything you need into your home directory. Use nvm to manage your node instances.
